content: a super cute and comfy beanie perfect for a winter coffee expedition or a farmer s market shopping trip made in wool these beanies are snuggly for winter wear made in cotton these beanies are ideal for autumn and spring wear you ll find that these beanies fly off the hook make them as gifts for your market stall or for charity top them with a pom pom for some extra cuteness use one or more colours to design a beanie that suits your individual groove matching vintage vibes baby beanie pattern now available here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vintage-vibes-baby-beanie a matching cowl/ infinity scarf pattern will also be available shortly the pattern uses beginner worthy double_crochet and chain stitches it includes instructions for the basic beanie and 5 additional variations including a messy hair beanie option any dk/ 8ply acrylic cotton wool or mixed fibre yarn can be used i hope you enjoy making your beanie
